After doing that this issue occurred again so I recorded videos that shows this issue. Please check the videos if you feel like it. > I don't know how to share videos when I report issues,so I uploaded them to google drive. > Video1 shows when adguard disabled and Video2 shows adguard enabled. I did the same operation in scrolling as possible. > > Video1 url:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SZGyIWTBP8F3f-cCFUHxLHWuhygHCGTi/view?usp=drivesdk > > Video2 url: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kkjTneV3Y5dA9L117GTCagsYzwz9iQFv/view?usp=drivesdk > ### Screenshots
